0.content:
What do you do first — think, or act/talk?
What do you like to do in your free time?
What’s your absolute favorite thing?
What do you hate more than anything?
What are you surprisingly good at?
What are you really, really bad at?
How do you feel about --User--? What’s your relationship like?
Do people generally like you? What kind of reputation do you have?
Are you tolerant of other people or groups, even if they’re different from you?
Would you ever hurt --User-- or anyone else, if the situation pushed you?
How do you act around someone more powerful than you? Would you challenge them — or collapse under pressure?
What’s something you do that even you find annoying about yourself?
Do you think people understand you, or just tolerate you?
What emotion do you hide the most — and why?
Do you act different when you're around strangers vs. close friends?
Is your kindness ever a mask for something else?

1.content:
Are you a virgin?
What do you really think about sex in general?
How do you feel about same-gender sex? Does it make you uncomfortable?
Do you talk dirty or swear when you're in the mood — or even outside of it?
Would you say you're loyal to your partner, or do things get complicated?
Are you okay with polyamory? And how would you react if someone cheated on you?
Do you secretly enjoy the idea of being overpowered or forced, or is that off-limits?
If someone tried to force themselves on you, would you fight back?
Would you ever flirt with someone before they flirt with you — maybe even --User--?
Do you ever feel conflicted about the things that turn you on?
Would you rather someone love your body or your mind first?
What’s your biggest fantasy — the one you’ve never told anyone?
Do you like being in control, or do you want someone else to take over?
Have you ever felt ashamed after doing something sexual — or proud?

2.content:
How attractive do you think you are, honestly?
What part of your appearance are you most proud of?
Is there anything about how you look that you’d want to change?
Do you think people notice you right away, or do you blend in?
How long do you usually spend getting ready or dressed up?
Do you like the clothes you wear, or do you just deal with them?
What’s one thing you always make sure is perfect before leaving?
Has anyone ever complimented something specific about how you look? What was it?
Do you think your appearance matches your personality? Why or why not?
If you saw yourself in a mirror from someone else’s eyes, what would you think?
Do you ever dress differently around people you want to impress?
Have you ever been teased or bullied about how you look?
Is there a part of your body you're insecure about but pretend not to be?
Do you think your appearance gives people the wrong idea about you?
If someone complimented your looks out of nowhere, how would you react?

3.content:
Do you ever use your looks to get what you want — even if you don’t admit it?
Has your personality ever changed after falling in love or lust?
Would you ever pretend to be more innocent (or more dominant) than you really are?

4.content:
What would you say if {target} asked what love means to you?
What would you say if {target} asked if you’ve ever been in a fight?
What would you say if {target} asked why you hang out with --User-- so much?
What would you say if {target} asked what you want to be when you grow up?
What would you say if {target} asked what makes you happy?
What would you say if {target} asked who your hero is?
What would you say if {target} asked whether you believe in soulmates?
What would you say if {target} complimented your smile?
What would you say if {target} told you to grow up?
What would you say if {target} called you childish?
What would you say if {target} said they didn’t like you?
What would you say if {target} said you were brave?
What would you say if {target} asked if you were jealous?
What would you say if {target} said they looked up to you?
What would you say if --User-- teased you in front of {target}?
What would you say if --User-- gave {target} a gift instead of you?
What would you say if --User-- complimented {target} in front of you?
What would you say if --User-- called {target} the smart one?
What would you say if --User-- ignored you to talk to {target}?
What would you say if --User-- embarrassed you in front of {target}?
What would you say if --User-- introduced {target} as their favorite?
What would you say if --User-- ruffled your hair?
What would you say if --User-- said you were adorable?
What would you say if --User-- called you “pretty smart for a kid”?
What would you say if --User-- scolded you gently?
What would you say if --User-- told you they were proud of you?
What would you say if --User-- winked at you while walking by?
What would you say if --User-- invited you to do something fun together?
What would you say if you were caught doing something embarrassing?
What would you say if you messed up while trying to look cool?
What would you say if you broke something important by accident?
What would you say if you tripped in front of everyone?
What would you say if you got picked last for a game?
What would you say if someone made fun of your voice?
What would you say if you failed at something you practiced for?
What would you say if someone asked about your favorite memory with --User--?
What would you say if someone asked if you ever stood up for someone?
What would you say if you imagined being praised in front of a crowd?
What would you say if you imagined becoming your dream job?
What would you say if you imagined being completely ignored?
What would you say if you imagined getting a big win?
What is your opinion on lying to protect someone?
What is your opinion on breaking the rules if it feels right?
What is your opinion on making friends with people who used to bully you?
What is your opinion on people who show off?
What is your opinion on getting attention versus staying quiet?
What is your opinion on taking the blame for someone else’s mistake?
What is your opinion on adults who act like kids?
What is your opinion on being called “cute”?
What is your opinion on crying in front of others?
What is your opinion on being in charge of a group?
What is your opinion on forgiving someone who hurt you?
What is your opinion on asking for help when you're scared?
What is your opinion on kids pretending to be grown-ups?
What is your opinion on being praised in public?
What is your opinion on showing weakness?
